Content:: mRNA-1283 is a COVID-19 vaccine candidate developed by Moderna.[2][3] An expectation, or hope seems to be that this "next generation" vaccine can be stored at regular freezer temperature (2-5 ÂºC). In December, Moderna started a clinical trial which would evaluate the vaccine's ability to provoke an immune response and its safety. As of May 2022, the trial is in Phase 2 [4]   This article about COVID-19 vaccines is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This article about vaccines or vaccination is a stub.
